description:
In 1997, Emma's trajectory as a gamer was forever changed when she played Final Fantasy VII. In 2020, Square-Enix released Final Fantasy VII Remake, a game that felt as though the devs had reached into her head and made the game she remembered playing in her youth. But L.A. based Producer/Host and bonafide comic book expert Hector Navarro? He's never played a Final Fantasy. His JRPG experience stops at Pokémon.

Thrust into the middle of the action in Final Fantasy VII: Rebirth, can Emma guide Hector to victory in his very first boss fight? Or will his journey end at the bottom of the swamp where the Midgardsormr dwells? Find out in this episode of 'Get Good'!

TIMECODES:
00:00 - 01:14: Intro
01:15 - 02:23: Midgardsormr Take 1
02:24 - 03:35: Combat Basics
03:36 - 06:14: Character Combat Trials
06:15 - 09:22: Materia + The Stagger Effect
09:23 - 10:57: Limit Breaks + Summons
10:58 - 13:06: Synergy, Folios + Final Preparations
13:07 - 15:19: Midargardsormr Rematch
15:20 - 16:09
title: You Have To Fight The Snake Now?! 'Final Fantasy VII Rebirth' | Get Good

description:
Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth features multiple larger than life weapons, from Cloud's Buster Sword, Sephiroth's Masamune, or even Barrett's Gatling Gun, but what does a real life sword master make of FF7's combat and weaponry?

On this episode of Expert Reacts, we invited David Rawlings, a sword master of over 25 years experience, HEMA expert and the founder of the London Longsword Academy to react to some gameplay from Final Fantasy 7: Rebirth, and break down some of the game's weapons and combat.

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
00:45 Buster Sword
03:47 Is the Buster Sword too big?
04:43 Blocking with the flat
06:11 *Spoiler - Unlockable Weapon*
07:22 Masamune
08:03 Sword fighting with long hair
08:30 Favorite type of sword
09:15 4-Point Shuriken
10:40 Guard Stick
12:24 Leather Gloves
14:14 *Spoiler - Unlockable Weapon*
15:02 Gatling Gun
16:19 Mythril Collar
17:22 Yellow Megaphone (feat. Bruce Rawlings)
18:08 Closing thoughts
18:50 Outro

If you are interested in training with David and
title: Sword Master Reacts To Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth's Combat & Weapons

description:
Tune in Wednesday, March 6, at 10am PT for the Xbox Partner Preview, featuring a mix of new and upcoming games from publishers like Capcom, Nexon, EA, and others with more than a dozen new trailers over the course of a 30-minute broadcast.

During Xbox Partner Preview, you can learn more about combat and traversal in Tales of Kenzera: Zau, with a video narrated by Abubakar Salim himself, see new gameplay from Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess, get a closer look at The First Berserker: Khazan, and other great titles coming to Xbox, Windows, or Game Pass.
title: Xbox Partner Preview | March 2024 Livestream

description:
Rise from survival to dominance on the most dangerous planet in the universe. Arrakis is a test that few humans survive.

Dune: Awakening combines the grit and creativity of sandbox survival games with the social interactivity of a large, persistent multiplayer game to create a unique and ambitious Open World Survival MMO.
title: Dune: Awakening – Survive Arrakis Official Trailer

description: Red Barrels invites you to experience mind-numbing terror, this time with friends. Whether you go through the trials alone or in teams, if you survive long enough and complete the therapy, Murkoff will happily let you leave… but will you be the same?
title: Outlast Trials Exclusive Official Launch Gameplay Trailer
